title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Toss Securities’ AI Transformation with automated Super App Ops. (GBL301)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Toss Securities 通过自动化超级应用运维实现 AI 转型 (GBL301)
abstract: Toss, Korea’s leading fintech innovator, serves 25 million users through their super app, offering seamless money transfers, banking, and securities services. Toss Securities bridges time zones and languages with Earnings Call Reports, sharing investment wisdom in stories that cross generations and transcend languages. As the app’s services expand, managing the increasingly complex super app becomes challenging. This session will show how Toss integrates Nova models with MCP for device testing, moving beyond checklist-based methods to natural language and user experience-driven app test automation, and share their future roadmap.
abstract_cn: Toss 是韩国领先的金融科技创新者，通过其超级应用为 2500 万用户提供服务，提供无缝的转账、银行和证券服务。Toss Securities 跨越时区和语言，通过财报电话会议报告分享投资智慧，讲述跨越世代和语言的故事。随着应用服务的扩展，管理日益复杂的超级应用变得具有挑战性。本次会议将展示 Toss 如何将 Nova 模型与 MCP 集成用于设备测试，超越基于清单的方法，实现自然语言和用户体验驱动的应用测试自动化，并分享他们的未来路线图。
